https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/i6YBg6dOT1gYfkmCzhpLAldrrtv.jpg The Devil's daughter rises from the grave, bringing with her zombies, werewolves, vampires and the armies of Hell to destroy Earth. Mankind's only hope for salvation lies in a young hippie girl and a comic book geek. Blood Moon Rising
